Summary._: PRIORITY REPAIRS  [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run via the [Q] from Canal St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and skip DeKalb Av

Description._: PRIORITY REPAIRS  [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run via the [Q] from Canal St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and skip DeKalb Av

LongDescription: <b><i>PRIORITY REPAIRS</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run via the [Q] from Canal St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and skip DeKalb Av</b><a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/ServiceGuide.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Weekend</font></a></font>, Saturday, Apr 7<br><br><font color=#272627>N</font>o Coney Island-bound [R] service at <b>City Hall</b>, <b>Cortlandt</b>, <b>Rector</b>, <b>Whitehall</b>, <b>Court Sts, Jay St-MetroTech<br></b>and <b>DeKalb Av</b>.<br><br></font>For service <i>to</i> <b>City Hall</b>, <b>Cortlandt</b>, <b>Rector</b> and <b>Whitehall Sts</b>, take the [Q]* or [W]* via transfer at Canal St.<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations take the [Q] instead. Transfer to the [R] at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.<br><br>For <b>Court St</b>, <b>Jay St-MetroTech</b> and <b>DeKalb Av</b>, take the [Q] via transfer at Canal St or <br>Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>

Summary._: ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS  [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn

Description._: ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS  [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn

LongDescription: <b><i>ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 6 - 9<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a <br><i>local</i> Manhattan-bound [D] [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [D] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer <br>to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] <i>local</i> or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><b><br>
